# GitHub Workflows and Templates

This directory contains GitHub Actions workflows and issue/PR templates for the AI Metadata Enricher repository.

## Directory Structure

```
.github/
├── workflows/              # GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows
│   └── README.md
└── ISSUE_TEMPLATE/        # Issue templates for bug reports, features, etc.
    └── README.md
```

## Purpose

### Workflows
- Automated CI/CD pipelines
- Code quality checks (linting, security scanning)
- Automated testing
- Infrastructure deployment
- Release automation

### Issue Templates
- Standardized bug reports
- Feature requests
- Documentation updates
- Security vulnerability reports

## Setting Up

These templates and workflows will be automatically recognized by GitHub when the repository is pushed.

---

See individual README files in subdirectories for detailed information.
